data.eml:eml: A new genus of isophlebioid damsel-dragonflies (Odonata: Isophlebioptera: Campterophlebiidae) from the Middle Jurassic of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, - Y., Lin, - B. (2007): A new genus of isophlebioid damsel-dragonflies (Odonata: Isophlebioptera: Campterophlebiidae) from the Middle Jurassic of China. Zootaxa 1642: 13-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179672
